rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 09, 09-1, 09-4}

description: This unit covers the theoretical structure and application of computable general equilibrium (CGE) models.  Topics include: the derivation of the model's non-linear equation system evaluation of coefficients and parameters, model closure, specification of economic shocks, solution techniques and interpretation of results.During hands-on computing sessions, students will undertake simulations of a series of economic policy questions and analyse results.
